name: Infinite Invasion
description:
A sudden attack!

While preparing to colonize the planet Rilm, two portals open up and release a flood of aliens. In order to save as many lives as possible, you hop into your ship and head out into the unforgiving vacuum of space.

ScoreSpace Jam Requirements:

Game can only use 1 joystick and 1 button

Game must feature a Highscore List

The theme was Swarms

Controller Controls: Left Joystick to move, A for everything else

Keyboard Controls: WASD to move, Spacebar for everything else

Created by:

Carter Ivancic

Christian Roby

Nate Luman

Olli Machina
